settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your store configuration, regions, payments, and team.

salesChannels.title: Sales Channels
salesChannels.description: Sales channels represent different storefronts or platforms where you sell products.
salesChannels.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this sales channel? Products will no longer be available through it.
salesChannels.name: Name

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.description: Manage publishable API keys for your storefront and integrations.
apiKeys.revokeConfirm: Are you sure you want to revoke this API key? Any applications using it will lose access immediately.

shipping.title: Shipping Options
shipping.description: View configured shipping options. Shipping options are managed through fulfillment providers and regions.
shipping.noOptions: No shipping options configured. Shipping options are created when you set up fulfillment providers for your regions.

payment.title: Payment Providers
payment.description: View configured payment providers. Payment providers handle payment processing for your store.
payment.noProviders: No payment providers configured. Add payment provider modules in your Medusa configuration.

regionSettings.title: Sales Regions
regionSettings.description: Manage the regions where your store operates. Each region defines a currency and applicable countries.
regionSettings.noRegions: No regions configured yet. Add your first region to start selling.
regionSettings.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this region? This action cannot be undone.
regionSettings.name: Name

users.title: Team Members
users.description: Manage your admin team. Invite new members to grant access to the dashboard.
users.inviteDescription: Send an invitation email to a new team member. They will be able to access the admin dashboard after accepting.
users.revokeConfirm: Are you sure you want to revoke this invitation? The invite link will no longer work.
